bug.author: xsacha
bug.summary: üêõ [Bug] C++ Serialise produces a model that cannot be loaded
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
When I serialise a model in C++ using .save() <denchmark-code>auto compile_settings = trtorch::ExtraInfo(dims); compile_settings.op_precision = torch::kFloat; m = trtorch::CompileGraph(m, compile_settings); // Serialise for later m.save(opt.string()); </denchmark-code>
Then try to do torch::jit::load on this model, I get: [enforce fail at ....\caffe2\serialize\inline_container.cc:209] . file not found: facespoof_grey_opt/constants.pkl Note: It appears to work correctly when saved from Python. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Same as Python <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
Build information about the TRTorch compiler can be found by turning on debug messages
PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0): 1.6.0 CPU Architecture: AMD64 OS (e.g., Linux): Windows How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, libtorch, source): libtorch Build command you used (if compiling from source): N/A Are you using local sources or building from archives: archives Python version: N/A CUDA version: 10.2 GPU models and configuration: RTX2060 Any other relevant information:

comments.comment: Can you try unzipping the TRTorch compiled program and see if that constants.pkl file is there? Also do you notice similar behavior if you load and save the module without compiling with TRTorch?
The compiled model has: data.pkl (approx twice size of original model) version (2 bytes) torch.jit.save works otherwise.

Are you able to run test_serialization in the test suite? To run the test first run hub.py in the tests/modules directory to download the test models. Then bazel test //tests/modules:test_serialization --test_output=errors

Edit: I found it doesn't copy all the required DLLs to bazel-out\x64_windows-fastbuild\bin\tests\modules After fixing this, I get: [ FAILED ] 4 tests, listed below: [ FAILED ] CompiledModuleForwardIsCloseSuite/ModuleTests.SerializedModuleIsStillCorrect/0, where GetParam() = ("tests/modules/resnet18_traced.jit.pt", { { 1, 3, 224, 224 } }) [ FAILED ] CompiledModuleForwardIsCloseSuite/ModuleTests.SerializedModuleIsStillCorrect/1, where GetParam() = ("tests/modules/pooling_traced.jit.pt", { { 1, 3, 10, 10 } }) [ FAILED ] CompiledModuleForwardIsCloseSuite/ModuleTests.SerializedDynamicModuleIsStillCorrect/0, where GetParam() = ("tests/modules/resnet18_traced.jit.pt", { { 1, 3, 224, 224 } }) [ FAILED ] CompiledModuleForwardIsCloseSuite/ModuleTests.SerializedDynamicModuleIsStillCorrect/1, where GetParam() = ("tests/modules/pooling_traced.jit.pt", { { 1, 3, 10, 10 } }) 4 FAILED TESTS Full log: <denchmark-link:https://pastebin.com/RUGi8uvF>https://pastebin.com/RUGi8uvF</denchmark-link>
Seems related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/TRTorch/issues/153>#153</denchmark-link>
